ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:02:08 [Issue ID 4000-185349] urn:comicvine:4000-185349 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:39:44. [Issue ID 250083]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Monster Within Part Three: I'd Rather Be In 1963: Shadowhawk travels back to 1963 where he and the Tomorrow Syndicate try to stop Comrade Cockroach from creating and spreading what will eventually emerge as the AIDS virus. They beat the roach and his allies but are unable to stop his infected agent who sneaks away to Africa to begin a new life.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Within Part Three: I'd Rather Be In 1963
